alert.note: Alert for Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 20 at 12:28PM MST until February 21 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills, and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines.Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Harlowton.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
